oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Automobile repair
Civilian Conservation Corps (U.S.); New Deal, 1933-1939
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Jimmy Criddle P-10 mechanic & Negro C. C. C. boys working on Chev. truck; Automotive Instruction - J. M. Criddle, Otto Haslbauer with Negro CCC boys." is written on the back of the photograph.
Tennessee was in the Fourth Corps Area, and along with portions of western North Carolina, Northern Georgia, Alabama, and Mississippi composed District C.
